scripts.watch-consumer-css: nodemon --exec 'yarn build-consumer-css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/consumer.css' --ext css,scss --watch src
scripts.watch-skeleton-css: nodemon --exec 'yarn build-skeleton-css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/skeleton.css' --ext css,scss --watch src
scripts.build-consumer-css: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/consumer.scss dist/consumer.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/consumer.css
scripts.build-dev-css: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/development.scss dist/development.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/development.css
scripts.build-dev-full-css: sass --no-source-map --style=compressed scripts/development-full.scss dist/development-full.css && yarn prettier --tab-width 2 --use-tabs false --write dist/development-full.css
scripts.build: rm -rf dist && yarn concurrently --raw 'yarn build-dev-css' 'yarn build-dev-full-css' 'yarn build-prod-css' 'yarn build-prod-full-css' 'yarn build-skeleton-css' 'yarn build-js' && yarn stats
